title: John Grisham - earnings 2010 to 2018
summary: This bar chart has 8 categories for the x axis representing Month, and a y axis representing Earnings in million U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at May_2011_to_May_2012 where Earnings in million U.S. dollars is 26.0.
The lowest category is found at June_2016_to_June_2017 where Earnings in million U.S. dollars is 14.0.
gold: The statistic presents data on the annual earnings of John Grisham from May 2010 to June 2018 . The author earned 21 million U.S. dollars in the period June 2017 to June 2018 , up from 14 million a year earlier .
